00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include <csgapplication.h>
00020 
00021 using namespace std;
00022 using namespace votca::csg;
00023 
00024 class CsgDumpApp
00025     : public CsgApplication
00026 {
00027     string ProgramName() { return "csg_dump"; }
00028     void HelpText(ostream &out) { out << "Print atoms that are read from topology file to help"
00029         " debugging atom naming."; }
00030     void Initialize() {
00031         CsgApplication::Initialize();
00032         AddProgramOptions("Specific options")
00033             ("excl", "  display exclusion list instead of molecule list");
00034     }
00035 
00036     bool EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00037 
00038     bool DoMapping() {return true;}
00039     bool DoMappingDefault(void) { return false; }
00040 };
00041 
00042 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00043 {
00044     CsgDumpApp app;
00045 
00046     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00047 }
00048 
00049 bool CsgDumpApp::EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00050 {
00051     if(!OptionsMap().count("excl")) {
00052         cout << "\nList of molecules:\n";
00053         MoleculeContainer::iterator mol;
00054         for (mol = top->Molecules().begin(); mol != top->Molecules().end(); ++mol) {
00055             cout << "molecule: " << (*mol)->getId() + 1 << " " << (*mol)->getName()
00056                     << " beads: " << (*mol)->BeadCount() << endl;
00057             for (int i = 0; i < (*mol)->BeadCount(); ++i) {
00058                 cout << (*mol)->getBeadId(i) << " " <<
00059                         (*mol)->getBeadName(i) << " " << (*mol)->getBead(i)->getType()->getName() << endl;
00060             }
00061         }
00062     }
00063     else {
00064         cout << "\nList of exclusions:\n" << top->getExclusions();
00065     }
00066     
00067     return true;
00068 }
